abstract: In his latest column, Andrew Ross Sorkin examines the human face behind the ups and downs of Wall Street that are so often covered by DealBook. These bankers are not, he says, just in it for the deal.
lead_paragraph: In his latest column, Andrew Ross Sorkin examines the human face behind the ups and downs of Wall Street that are so often covered by DealBook. These bankers are not, he says, just in it for the deal.

headline.main: Real Losses Have Nothing to Do With Money
